Name: MARSHAL'S MIGHTY SCEPTER OF THE APPRENTICE
Text: MARSHAL'S MIGHTY SCEPTER OF THE APPRENTICE|ONE-HAND DAMAGE: 40 TO 52|DURABILITY: 50 OF 50|REQUIRED DEXTERITY: 65|REQUIRED STRENGTH: 125|REQUIRED LEVEL: 46|MACE CLASS - FAST ATTACK SPEED|+3 TO OFFENSIVE AURAS (PALADIN ONLY)|+10% FASTER CAST RATE|+3 TO CONVICTION (PALADIN ONLY)|+3 TO FIST OF THE HEAVENS (PALADIN ONLY)|+3 TO HOLY SHOCK (PALADIN ONLY)|+50% DAMAGE TO UNDEAD|CTRL + LEFT CLICK TO DROP
